name: HH_EPSD_OASIS_RACE
description: This table contains user-entered Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) race information for Home Health episodes.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OASIS_RACE_M0140_C_NAME
columns.description: OASIS race category list selections for the episode.  Links to category table ZC_OASIS_RACE.
